bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from the Smithsonian Institution to Jefferson Randolph Kean, April 10, 1935

div1.p: This is an invoice to Kean for the return of a marble bust of Reed from the Smithsonian Institution to the Walter Reed Memorial Association.

div1.head: Letter from the Smithsonian Institution to Jefferson Randolph Kean, April 10, 1935
div1.opener:
FROM GEN. ALBERT E. TRUBY
SMITHSONIAN INSTITUTION
UNITED STATES NATIONAL MUSEUM
Washington, D C., U.S.A.
SHIPPING INVOICE
April 10, 1935.
To The Walter Reed Memorial Association
Brig. Gen. Jefferson R. Kean, President.
Washington, D. C.
div1.p:
On the recommendation of Charles Whitebread, Asst. Curator of Division of Medicine
the material listed below contained in ------------ is transmitted as 5.
1. a gift
2. a loan at your
request
3. in exchange
4. for examination
at our request
5. return of material borrowed
6. return of material sent
for identification
7...........
8...........

row.cell:
Marble bust of Major Walter Reed,
with pedestal.

div1.p: Received the above in good order (date)
div1.closer:
/s/ Albert E. Truby
Brig. Gen. Med. Dept., USA,
For the Walter Reed Memorial Assoc. Retain this copy for your records.
ARMY MEDICAL CENTER WASHINGTON, D.C.
OFFICIAL
